title: I can’t login, but I don’t think I got hacked or anything. Just want some of your opinions ^^
body:
Hey,
I can’t log in, but I don’t think I got hacked or anything. I tried to reset my password multiple times, and the password link always gets sent, but after resetting the password, it still says wrong username or password. When I log onto the client, it says my account got transferred to another server, but I still have the account on the friendlist of my smurfs. And on sites like lolking it still says my account is in euw. I already contacted their support five days ago but haven't got any answer yet which isn't severe^^ I don't know, it is just extremely weird. My account pretends it is there, but it isn't actually.
Hope you have some ideas, and maybe a rioter can say something to this case.
Thanks
Ps: Please don't mind my English, I am still learning

replies.body:
Hmm.. it kinda sounds like your account may have been compromised, especially because you cannot log in and you've seen a message about it being transferred. We'll definitely help you out with this, but it will require some investigation, so we'll need to get back to you in your support ticket.

Response times are a bit longer than normal, due to the end of the ranked season and all the new stuff going out, but we'll have a specialist with you as soon as we can. :)

Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.

Thanks for the answer :D
Didn't actually expect a rioter to answer
I can't imagine how my account could be compromised... In the match history you can see three games which are not played by me (but you can only see them on the client when I log onto my smurf while on sites like lolking,op.gg those three games are not listed) My question is why? I am sure you have lots of request because of the season end, but I am worried that I wrote my email incorrectly :/ I don't want to waste my and yours time... But I don't even think that I actually got compromised because I still have access to the account's email. My account is still on euw (regarding the information on lolking,op.gg and on the lol client) I think I can tell the account's summoner name, don't want to break any rules (summoner name:My Creative Name) 
Thanks :)

I can't confirm whether or not this is the case, since we'll have to investigate into this to figure out what's going on. As I mentioned before, we'll be able to do this further in your support ticket.

Thanks for your active help but I thought your support would answer to the email, which I gave them in the ticket? Now I see on the smurf (for whatever reason the ticket is shown on another account^^)that it was answered but can't read it actually. I didn't even get an email (checked spam as well)... There is just a white box. The status says "Awaiting your reply"^^ What should I do?

When you a submit a ticket for an account recovery, you will receive any and all replies to the email you supplied when you filled out the form. I can take a further look at this if you provide me your ticket number.

Ticket ID: 24042068
The ticket status says "solved" but haven't received an answer yet. I created the ticket 12 days ago
I created another ticket 4 days ago, because I thought something went wrong there. This status just says "Awaiting your reply" but it is the same problem as above :/
The newer ticket id: 24189785
Thanks for taking a further look into this :)
It looks like you received a response from one of our specialists yesterday. Can you confirm the email with the reply isn't sitting in your filtered or spam/junk folder?

No, I am sorry I have checked everywhere, but I couldn't find an email from the riot games player support :/ I could send you 1000 screenshots :D, So the email is not sitting in the spam/junk folder. What can we do about this? :) Can you send it to another email address, because my email provider is maybe the fault for not accepting your email.  Thanks again for your response

I notified your specialist to try sending another reply, so I hope you get it. 

Let me know if you don't have it in the next 24 hours.

It is now 24 hours ago, and I still haven't received any answer from the riot games player support... Checked again spam/junk. Should I open a new ticket and give you a new email address? I am slowly getting angry because it takes weeks to get my account back :/ Hope we can fix that asap
Thanks

I checked your ticket and we sent multiple replies to ensure you'd get it from our end. I suspect this may be an issue with your mail provider. At this point, I'd recommend using a different email service to resubmit your ticket.

I understand this is pretty frustrating, but we aren't going to leave you behind. ^.^
Nope, I definitely didn't receive any email from you guys... What can we do about this?
